div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 391 Risan (anc. Rhizon), southern Dal- matia, Yugoslavia, 1927 Burial: c. 330 B.C. (Horvat); after 330? (May) Contents: c. 300 AR Damastium and lesser Illyro-Paeonian coinages: c. 200 tetradr. Corinth and colonies: c. 100 st. (including Dyrrhachium, Leucas, and Anactorium) Disposition: Mus√©e du Prince Paul and priv. coll. Belgrade, 50; priv. coll. Belgrade, 50; priv. colls. Zagreb, 20 Horvat, Numismatika Zagreb 2-4 (1934-6), pp. 26-64, some illus. May, Damastion, pp. 8, 11, 37,126, 199-202, illus. (31 coins)
